titleStmt.title: A true account of a bloody fight between the Turks and Christians from the imperial camp and from the Spanish ambasssador to the Marquess de Grana; with an account likewise from Brussels, declaring the total overthrow of the Turkish army at Barkan, with the surrendering of the fort of Barkan to the Christians.

publicationStmt.publisher: reprinted by Andrew Crook in Skinner-Row,

notesStmt.note: Consists of two brief letters describing the battle; neither letter is signed; each is headed by a caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
